item.title: How I struggled to build a Nextcloud server (and won!)
item.description: Why am I doing this to myself? I really like taking notes. Notes are an extension of my stupid brain, which can’t remember a damn thing on its own. All these notes were being stored on Google’s servers, which didn&rsquo;t seem like the best idea. And it wasn’t just notes. Pictures, videos, miscellaneous files, I was giving it all to Google for free. Since my notes contain my bad ideas, and they are my bad ideas alone, I wanted to take back control of my data.
